question: Who has become the world's oldest verified living person?
explanation: Kane Tanaka (115), a Japanese super centenarian,  has become the world\'s oldest verified living person following the death of Chiyo Miyako  on July 22, 2018.  Born on 2nd January 1903, Tanaka is in good health, occasionally playing board games and taking short walks in the facility\'s hallways. She credits family, sleep and hope as her secrets for longevity.
